sentence: The war cry for justice was all over - Much to the chagrin of the authorities.
Portuguese: O grito de guerra pela justiça estava todo - muito para o desgosto das autoridades.
backtrans: The cry of war for justice was all - much for the disgust of authorities.

sentence: The regime's decision adumbrates the underlying agenda.
Portuguese: A decisão do regime adumbrece a agenda subjacente.
backtrans: The decision of the regimen adumbrates the underlying agenda.

sentence: The community was anxious over the passing of the much needed reforms.
Portuguese: A comunidade estava ansiosa sobre a aprovação das reformas necessárias.
backtrans: The community was anxious about approving the necessary reforms.

sentence: The think tank  published a paper outlining their apology of capital punishment.
Portuguese: O think tank publicou um artigo delineando seu pedido de desculpas de pena de capital.
backtrans: The Think Tank published an article outlining its apology for capital penalty.

sentence: Aught was left of the petition's validity
Portuguese: Aurght foi deixado da validade da petição
backtrans: Aurght was left of the validity of the petition

sentence: The President exhorted his ministers to buckle up as key opposition support for his economic plan was about to buckle.
Portuguese: O presidente exortou seus ministros a se acariciar como apoio chave da oposição para seu plano econômico estava prestes a fivela.
backtrans: The president exhorted his ministers to caress as key support of opposition to his economic plan was about to buckle.

sentence: The voters were chuffed to see the bill passed.
Portuguese: Os eleitores foram enchidos para ver a conta passada.
backtrans: The voters were stuffed to see the passed account.

sentence: The lawyer's discursive narration swayed the jury.
Portuguese: A narração discursiva do advogado balançou o júri.
backtrans: The discursive narration of the lawyer swayed the jury.

sentence: The EU block opposed an eventual imposition of anti-dumping measures.
Portuguese: O bloco da UE se opôs por uma eventual imposição de medidas anti-dumping.
backtrans: The EU block opposed an eventual imposition of anti-dumping measures.

sentence: A fulsome eulogy was delivered by the sly counsel.
Portuguese: Um elogio fulome foi entregue pelo conselho malicioso.
backtrans: A Fulome compliment was delivered by the malicious council.

sentence: The gig-economy agency decided to garnish the refunds!
Portuguese: A Agência Gig-Economy decidiu enfeitar os reembolsos!
backtrans: The Gig-Economy agency decided to decorate repayments!

sentence: Members of the anti-theocratic revolutionary movement overthrew the peers in power!
Portuguese: Os membros do movimento revolucionário anti-teocrático derrubaram os pares no poder!
backtrans: Members of the anti-theocratic revolutionary movement knocked on pairs in power!

sentence: The traitors disappointingly decided to fight with the colonialists.
Portuguese: Os traidores decidiram lutar com os colonialistas.
backtrans: The traitors decided to fight the colonialists.
